Abilities.Name: Broodmate Swarm
Abilities.Ability: When you put Swazlid Broodmates in play, place down two marked swazlid swarm tokens.

Abilities.Name: Vision (Broodmate)
Abilities.Ability: When calculating line of site, Swazlid Broodmates can use the line of site of either of it's marked Swazlid Swarm tokens.
